dict.string: Search for IPA characters and paste them into the frontmost app.
IPA Characters by Typefacts and Sebastian Carewe

The Typefacts IPA Characters Workflow
This workflow is an adapation of the Typefacts special characters workflow. Similarly, it allows insertion of characters by searching for keywords, but is instead specialised in IPA symbols.
Search for a consonant or vowel by its articulatory description.
---
This workflow was built by:
Norman Posselt (@norman_posselt) Frank Rausch (@frankrausch) Sebastian Carewe (@eweracs)
